name: 60 in 1 Game Collection
overview: 60 thrilling games to test your reflexes, memory, and skill. Play this compendium of fun games alone or compete with others. The world's most diverse collection of mini-games on Nintendo Switch. 60 games - play against family or friends with up to 4 players at once. Games from genres: Action, Strategy, Sports, Puzzles, Platformers. Infinite replayability. Can you get on the high scores tables?
